|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9812G6JH-6; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 2012 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 844660087427 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00A3IFJO6 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = none |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :[http://www.monopricehub.com/files/manuals/8742_Manual_120807.pdf Manual] {{â€¢}}[http://web.archive.org/web/20140224022751/http://www.monopricehub.com/files/manuals/8742_Manual_120807.pdf Manual via ''archive.org'']
"10009992", "V3.0", and a lead-free logo is silkscreened on the board in the images below.
While the FCC ID on the unit's label is '''V7TW368R''', this is in error :<small>(for at least the unit shown in this entry, for some units it may be correct)</small>. :That FCC ID was for the RT3052 based W368Rs.. (2T2R MIMO 300Mbps)
The manual provided by '''Monoprice''' states the default wireless PSK is '''12345678'''.. :and that it can only be changed to another 8 character string.
===Used PSU(s)=== The power adapter shown above is a ''Heweishun'' TEA09U-09100 :''Shenzhen Heweishun Network Technology Co., Ltd.''
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = Shenzhen Heweishun Network Technology |model = TEA09U-09100 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.3 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=9 |output_a=1 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |e_level=5 |countrymanuf = China |style=small, horiz. }}
==Links of Interest== [http://www.monopricehub.com/files/manuals/8742_Manual_120807.pdf Manual] ([http://web.archive.org/web/20140224022751/http://www.monopricehub.com/files/manuals/8742_Manual_120807.pdf also via ''archive.org''])
